name: Semiconductor Inline Test & Metrology
description: Sub-sector template for semiconductor in-line testing and metrology patents (CPC H01L22*) including inspection, measurement, and process control.
contextDescription: Inline test and metrology patents cover wafer-level inspection and measurement. Key areas include optical inspection (KLA), CD-SEM, OCD (scatterometry), e-beam inspection, and process control. High-value targets include metrology equipment vendors (KLA, Applied Materials, ASML) and foundries. Critical for yield learning at advanced nodes.
scoringGuidance: Defect inspection patents target KLA's core business.
CD (critical dimension) metrology is essential for patterning control.
Overlay metrology patents are critical for multi-patterning.
E-beam inspection patents target advanced node debugging.
Process control patents enable closed-loop manufacturing.

questions.question: What type of metrology or inspection does this patent cover (optical, e-beam, CD, overlay, defect)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify the metrology type and its importance in the fab.

questions.question: Is this relevant to advanced node metrology challenges (EUV, sub-10nm)? Score higher for cutting-edge requirements.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Advanced nodes have more stringent metrology requirements.

questions.question: Does this target inspection/metrology equipment vendors (KLA, Applied, ASML)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Metrology equipment is a concentrated market with few major players.

questions.question: Does this enable closed-loop process control or APC (advanced process control)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Process control integration increases the value of metrology data.
